TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: I would like to have my name changed to AquaAlmond, and if that name is still taken by my old account then as an alternative could you change it to Aqua Almond
Can you change my name to National Space Exploration Program if you could? It might be too long, and if it is too long you dont have to do anything.

> 
> 
> On 16/08/2016 at 3:08 AM, Supernovy said:
> 
> 
> Changed.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Not changed.
> 

Name changed to NurgleBurger.

> I would like to have my name changed to AquaAlmond, and if that name is still taken by my old account then as an alternative could you change it to Aqua Almond

Hey, I'm new here. First, if this is in the wrong section, I'm sorry, can a mod move it? Anyways, I need my username changed. I really REALLY don't want such a cringey name to stick around me, if it can't be changed let it be, if it can, can a mod dm me?
Your name [can be changed](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110713-the-name-change-thread-warning-one-time-only/). Once only though.

Also regarding the question if this is in the wrong section, it would most likely fit in best with in the *Kerbal Network*.

Also, since I haven't see you and you're new, welcome to the forums!
